name: CurrencyManager
description: CurrencyManager. It allows adding/removing currencies for trading on the LooksRare exchange.

eventDecorators.name: CurrencyRemoved
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. Emitted when a NFT stops staking; either through standard means or by expulsion.

eventDecorators.name: CurrencyWhitelisted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. Emitted when a NFT stops staking; either through standard means or by expulsion.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. Emitted when a NFT stops staking; either through standard means or by expulsion.

functionDecorators.name: addCurrency
functionDecorators.description: Add a currency in the system.

parameterDecorators.name: currency
parameterDecorators.description: address of the currency to add.

functionDecorators.name: isCurrencyWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Returns if a currency is in the system.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeCurrency
functionDecorators.description: Remove a currency from the system.

parameterDecorators.name: currency
parameterDecorators.description: address of the currency to remove.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: viewWhitelistedCurrencies
functionDecorators.description: See whitelisted currencies in the system.

parameterDecorators.name: cursor
parameterDecorators.description: cursor (should start at 0 for first request).
